message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item boasts a unique blend of quality, functionality, and style, making it an ideal choice for anyone seeking excellence. We believe its value far exceeds $120, but considering your potential needs and preferences, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $150. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.
